content.rendered:
Anelis Tarabuta is an Admissions, Recruitment and Widening Access (ARWA) Officer at Regent College London. She holds a Bachelors Degree in International Relationship and European Studies from Babes Bolyiai Cluj Napoca Romania and has over 10 years of extensive customer service. She has experience working in a senior management position within the hospitality industry.

She is a strong and independent individual with extensive experience in recruitment, hospitality management and customer service. She truly believes that a successful company is always built by its employees and her main focus is to motivate, help, train and develop skills for any potential customer.

She considers herself as a very fast learner and is very eager to encounter new challenges and make sure that every customer receives the best service. One of her best skills is adaptability and flexibility in any task she performs.

She is always ready to help and is looking forward helping the customer achieve their dreams.
